SEARCH

Interface QuestionInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultipleChoiceQuestion, Question
public interface QuestionInterface
The QuestionInterface is used to implement Question objects. Having it as an interface allows for easy polymorphism with different question types (single choice/multiple choice are implemented in this project, but free-response questions could probably be implemented as well). There are a pleothera of getters and setters to allow for easy access and manipulation of the Answers set (since sets don't have random access but have duplicate entry protection)
Version:
1.0
Author:
George Matta

      Parameters:

      Returns:
